cases.heading: Case Studies
cases.description: Real results from real client partnerships.

fhrase.name: Fhrase.com
fhrase.description: For Fhrase we built a fully 'hands-off' ecosystem. From an automated supply chain with 3PL integration to AI-generated fashion copy that aligns with their premium branding.
fhrase.challenge: Fhrase needed a scalable e-commerce solution that could handle global sourcing, automated inventory management, and premium brand presentation without manual overhead.
fhrase.solution: We built a headless Shopify storefront with AI-powered content generation, 3PL logistics integration, and real-time stock synchronization across suppliers.
results: 42% increase in ROI within the first quarter
Fully automated supply chain with 3PL integration
AI-generated product descriptions matching premium brand voice
